name: 恋鐘
text: 揃わん～……！
trans: We ain't gettin' together~...!

name: 恋鐘
text:
こがん会えんとは……
このゲーム、なかなか強敵ばい……！
trans:
This game's mighty tough if it's
keeping us apart like this...

name: 結華
text:
いやー……あはは
夜になっちゃったもんね……
trans:
Ahh... Ahaha.
It's gotten pretty late...

name: 結華
text:
まぁまぁ夜のお散歩っていうのも
オツなものだとは思いますが！
trans:
Well, I think a nighttime stroll is something to be
enjoyed in and of itself too!

name: 咲耶
text:
フフ……
そろそろ泊まる場所を探した方がいいのだろうか
trans:
Hehe... It might be best to start looking for
somewhere to stay overnight.

name: 咲耶
text: 夜間、カメラを回さない時間はあるのかな？
trans:
Is there a time when the cameras will shut off for
the night?

name: 摩美々
text:
……ちょっとー
勝手に諦めるの禁止だからぁ
trans:
...Hold it.
No one said you all can just give up here.

name: 摩美々
text: 休む算段の前に、続きー
trans: Do another one before we think about resting.

name: 結華
text: 珍しいね
trans: That's pretty rare.

name: 恋鐘
text: 珍しか～！
trans: Rare for sure~!

name: 霧子
text:
でも……
楽しいな……
trans:
But...
this is fun...

name: 霧子
text:
今日は……
珍しいこと……いっぱい……
trans:
So many...
rare things... happened today...

name: 霧子
text:
知らなかった……みんなのお顔……
いっぱい……
trans:
I got to see... lots of new sides to everyone...
I didn't know about...

name: プロデューサー
text:
今までの仲の良さを試されるテストとしてじゃなくて
もっと相手を知るための授業として楽しんでもらえたらって
trans:
Rather than facing it like a test of how close you
really are, you could enjoy it as a lesson in getting
to know more about each other.

name: プロデューサー
text:
知らなかったことがあったって
今知ればいいだけなんだ、って──
trans:
Even if there are things you didn't know about
each other, you can learn them from now on──

name: 摩美々
text: ……ひとつ、白状してもいいですかぁ
trans: ...Can I fess up to something?

name: 摩美々
text:
私ー
今日のロケ、心配してたんだよねー
trans:
You see...
I was pretty worried about today's shoot.

name: 摩美々
text:
全然答え合わなくて、
終われなかったらどうしようーって
trans:
Like, what if our answers don't match,
and the game never ends...

name: 摩美々
text: ……みんなの気持ちとかぁ
trans: ...and, if I really knew you all that well.

name: 摩美々
text:
わかってるつもりで、
全然わかってなかったらどうしようー……みたいな
trans:
What if, I thought I knew, but it turned out
that I didn't... kind of like that.

name: 摩美々
text:
やっぱり、答え合わせるのって難しかったし
今も終われる気がしないケドー
trans:
It's been hard trying to match our answers,
and it doesn't look like it'll end anytime soon.

name: 摩美々
text: ……でも、霧子も言ってたみたいに
trans: ...But, it's just like Kiriko said.

name: 摩美々
text:
新しいみんなを知れた、って考えるなら
別に心配はしなくてよかったなぁって思ってるとこー
trans:
Maybe if I think of this as getting to know everyone
all over again, then I wouldn't have to worry about
anything.

name: 摩美々
text:
……ねえ咲耶
どう思うー？
trans:
...Right, Sakuya?
What do you think?

name: 咲耶
text: ……ああ、そうだね……！
trans: ...Yes, you're right... !

name: 咲耶
text:
私たちにとっては……
きっと、杞憂だったんだ……！
trans:
I'm sure that for us...
It's nothing to worry about... !

name: 摩美々
text:
それじゃー白状その２
三峰からぁ
trans:
And now, confession number 2.
Let's hear it from Mitsumine.

name: 結華
text:
うん！？
そういう流れ……！？
trans:
Me?!
You're passing this to me...?!

name: 結華
text:
えっと、まみみんに倣うのなら！
三峰も勝手に心配したかなー
trans:
Umm, following what Mamimin said...!
Mitsumine guesses she was worried about her too.

name: 結華
text:
まみみん、このゲーム不安なのかな？　って思って
できることはしなきゃーって
trans:
I was concerned whether or not Mamimin was
worried about the game, and I was thinking of
doing what I can for that.

name: 結華
text:
まぁ……
結果、初手のように空回ったりしましたけども……
trans:
Well... I ended up making some wrong moves
like in that first round...

name: 霧子
text:
……
わたしは……
trans:
......
I think...

name: 霧子
text:
みんなが……
楽しかったら……いいなって……
trans:
It'd be nice...
if everyone... had fun...

name: 恋鐘
text:
うん～！
そいはうちも！
trans:
Uh-huh~!
I think so too!

name: 恋鐘
text:
んふふ～
どがんしよ～って言いよったけど
trans:
Nfufu~
I went around wonderin' what to do, but...

name: 恋鐘
text: みんなで話せばよかだけやった！
trans: We shoulda just talked it out!

name: 恋鐘
text:
そうしとったら、
も～っと楽しかったとに！
trans:
If we did that...
It've been even mooore fun!

name: 咲耶
text: ……みんな──
trans: ...Everyone──

name: 摩美々
text: 大丈夫でしょー
trans: We'll be fiiine.

name: 摩美々
text:
今わかったんだから、
間に合ってる
trans:
Now that we know,
we can still make it.

name: 霧子
text: うん……
trans: Yeah...

name: 結華
text: 気を取り直して、まだまだ知り合ってこっか！
trans:
Let's still keep rolling with getting to
know one another!

name: 恋鐘
text: 朝まで自己紹介やね～！
trans: We'll keep introducin' ourselves till the sun rises!

name: 摩美々
text:
高校組的にはそれはちょっとー
夜は働けないんで
trans:
I don't think us highschoolers are up to that.
We can't work at night.

name: 摩美々
text:
揃わなくてもへこまなくていいってだけで
ゴールはちゃんとしないとー
trans:
All I'm saying is not to get down if we can't meet
up soon. We still have to get to the goal somehow.

name: 結華
text: あはは、ごもっとも……
trans: Ahaha, you're right...

name: 恋鐘
text: 乗ってほしかったとに、摩美々～……！
trans: I was hopin' you'd go along with it, Mamimi~...!

name: 咲耶
text:
──フフ
次のお題が、楽しみになってきたな……！
trans:
──Fufu.
I'm looking forward to the next question now...!

name: スタッフ
text:
……みなさん
お助け要素は、どうされます？
trans:
Everyone...
Would you like to try your hand on a lifeline?

name: 摩美々
text: 助けてもらってもいいんじゃないー？
trans: Isn't it alright to ask for help here?

name: 摩美々
text:
相談の時間もらえるやつ、あったでしょー
それ、ピッタリじゃーん
trans:
There's one that gives us time to discuss, right?
That's just perfect for us.

name: 咲耶
text: ──ああ
trans: ──Yes.

name: 咲耶
text: 私も摩美々に一票だ
trans: I second Mamimi's suggestion.

name: 霧子
text: うん……
trans: Yes...

name: 結華
text: アタリの『お助け』を狙わなきゃだねぇ
trans: We've got to aim for the best one.

name: 恋鐘
text: 絶対引けるばい！
trans: We're gonna get it for sure!

name: スタッフ
text:
──それでは改めて、簡単ですが、ルールの説明を
代表の方に、カードを１枚引いていただきます
trans:
──Once again, I'll explain the rules briefly.
One representative just has to draw a single card.

name: スタッフ
text:
そのカードにお助けの内容が書かれていればその通りに
書かれていなければ何もナシ、のルールです
trans:
If the card has a lifeline described on it, you may
make use of it. But if it's blank, nothing happens.
Those are the rules.

name: スタッフ
text:
カードはみなさんに同行しているスタッフも持っています
どなたが引かれますか？
trans:
The staff members travelling with each of you have
the cards on hand. Which one of you shall draw?

name: 咲耶
text: 私が引いても、いいだろうか
trans: Would it be alright if I try?

name: 咲耶
text:
きっとみんなが欲しいカードを引いてみせる
ただ──
trans:
I'll surely draw the card that we all want.
However──

name: 咲耶
text:
──もしハズレを引いてしまったら、
終わらないロケに付き合ってほしいのだけれど
trans:
──even if I draw a blank, please stay with me
through this shoot even if it doesn't end.

name: 摩美々
text: 頼んだぁ、咲耶
trans: I'm counting on you, Sakuya.

name: 恋鐘
text:
うん～！
よろしく～咲耶～！
trans:
Yup~!
Do yer best, Sakuya~!

name: 霧子
text: うん……！
trans: Yeah...!

name: 結華
text: ファイト、さくやん！
trans: Fight on, Sakuyan!

name: 咲耶
text: ──ああ！
trans: ──Of course!

name: 咲耶
text: 私が引いたカードは────
trans: The card I drew is────
